title: Banana split pancakes
ingredients: ['125g plain flour', '1 tablespoon soft brown sugar', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 ripe bananas', '250ml milk', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '100g dark chocolate chips', '325g sliced fresh strawberries', '200ml whipped cream']
